mapper.select: select emp_id, emp_nm, dept_nm from tbl_emp join tbl_dept on tbl_emp.dept_id = tbl_dept.dept_id where tbl_emp.emp_nm like '%'||#{emp_nm}||'%'

select e.emp_id , e.emp_nm , d.dept_nm , e.teleno , e.road_nm , listagg(h.hobby_nm, ',') within group ( order by h.hobby_nm desc) as hobby_nm ,listagg(h.hobby_id, ',') within group ( order by h.hobby_id desc) as hobby_id from tbl_emp e inner join tbl_emp_hobby eh on e.emp_id = eh.emp_id inner join tbl_hobby h on h.hobby_id = eh.hobby_id inner join tbl_dept d on d.dept_id = e.dept_id where e.emp_id = #{emp_id} group by e.emp_id, e.emp_nm, d.dept_nm, e.teleno, e.road_nm
mapper.update: merge into tbl_emp using tbl_dept on (tbl_dept.dept_id = #{dept_id} AND tbl_emp.emp_id= #{emp_id}) when matched then update set tbl_emp.emp_nm = #{emp_nm}, tbl_emp.teleno = #{teleno}, tbl_emp.road_nm = #{road_nm}, tbl_emp.dept_id = tbl_dept.dept_id
